facade

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class is Company business-layer level that uses for speaking with Company credentials with DAO-layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrey Orlov
